speaker: Episode 15 - Murder on the Rockport Limited - Chapter Six
Griffin
lines: Previously, on the Adventure Zone

speaker: Angus
lines: If the object of value that the three of you are trying to claim is somewhere on this train, then I have reason to believe that the Rockport Slayer is somewhere on the train too.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You see a shadow through the frosted glass of the sleeper car breeze past. You see a large pool of blood on the outside of the closed door. This body is wearing robes. It has been beheaded. Both of its hands are missing and it has a shimmering… rainbow… bowtie.

speaker: Everyone
lines: No! No!

speaker: Travis
lines: No, we didn’t appreciate him while he was alive!

speaker: Clint
lines: Jenkins!

speaker: Griffin
lines: The cut through the neck is very clean. You hear a deafening roar come from that room.

speaker: Graham
lines: The last time I saw Jenkins was just a few minutes before I found him. He came up and did a drink service up here.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You hear the engineer’s voice come from a small cone above the door.

speaker: Hudson
lines: Jenkins was a dedicated employee of the Ro—

speaker: Magnus
lines: Well now he’s just a dead employee.

speaker: Taako
lines: A dead employee!

speaker: Clint
lines: I pick up the nodule. It’s a little sticky. I put it in my ear.

speaker: Scuttle Buddy
lines: [buzzes as if to say “I love you”].

speaker: Merle
lines: I love you too, scuttle buddy.

speaker: Announcer
lines: Put on your thinking caps, gumshoes! It’s time to solve a murder in The Adventure Zone!
